job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
SUMMARY:&nbsp;Apex Systems has an immediate opening for a Machine Learning Engineer&nbsp;for a client in the financial services industry. The position is a contract-to-hire, offering a competitive compensation package. The successful candidate must come from a machine learning environment and have Java development experience.   This is a great opportunity to get your foot in the door with a large IT company to grow with internally!   ***Must be USC or Green Card No C2C****   ROLE: Machine Learning EngineerTERM: Long term contract to hireLOCATION:&nbsp;Remote (company in Rockville, MD)   QUALIFICATIONS:     - Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.&nbsp;   
  - Core Java    
  - 4+ years Machine Learning experience   
  - AWS Core Services   
  - Experience with web based technologies, specifically HTML
